judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Court being equally divided in opinion, the case is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Alessandroni, of the lower court.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: B. Graeme Frazier, Jr., with him Frazier & Frazier, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Escheat of $92,800. Commonwealth Appeal.
Argued November 16, 1951.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
reargument refused February 14, 1952.
January 7, 1952:
B. Graeme Frazier, Jr., with him Frazier & Frazier, for appellant.
Raymond J. Broderick, for appellee.
